ci.prTitle: chore(deps)(deps-dev): bump @types/node from 25.2.3 to 25.3.0 in the development group

metadata.gitDiff:
diff --git a/.github/workflows/playwright-github-hosted.yml b/.github/workflows/playwright-github-hosted.yml
index 5c3afc4..459c081 100644
--- a/.github/workflows/playwright-github-hosted.yml
+++ b/.github/workflows/playwright-github-hosted.yml
@@ -72,6 +72,17 @@ jobs:
             echo "OLLAMA_API_KEY MISSING in .env"
           fi
 
+      - name: Validate GROQ key via API
+        env:
+          OLLAMA_API_KEY: ${{ secrets.GROQ_API_KEY }}
+        run: |
+          status=$(curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" -H "Authorization: Bearer $OLLAMA_API_KEY" https://api.groq.com/openai/v1/models || echo "000")
+          echo "GROQ API HTTP status: $status"
+          if [ "$status" = "401" ]; then
+            echo "GROQ key appears invalid (401)"
+            exit 1
+          fi
+
       - name: Run smoke tests
         id: tests
         run: npm run test:smoke
diff --git a/package-lock.json b/package-lock.json
index a30e386..6be9cf8 100644
--- a/package-lock.json
+++ b/package-lock.json
@@ -18,7 +18,7 @@
         "@eslint/js": "^9.39.2",
         "@playwright/test": "^1.58.2",
         "@types/eslint": "^9.6.1",
-        "@types/node": "^25.2.3",
+        "@types/node": "^25.3.0",
         "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.55.0",
         "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^8.55.0",
         "eslint": "^9.39.2",
@@ -720,13 +720,13 @@
       "license": "MIT"
     },
     "node_modules/@types/node": {
-      "version": "25.2.3",
-      "resolved": "https://registry.npmjs.org/@types/node/-/node-25.2.3.tgz",
-      "integrity": "sha512-m0jEgYlYz+mDJZ2+F4v8D1AyQb+QzsNqRuI7xg1VQX/KlKS0qT9r1Mo16yo5F/MtifXFgaofIFsdFMox2SxIbQ==",
+      "version": "25.3.0",
+      "resolved": "https://registry.npmjs.org/@types/node/-/node-25.3.0.tgz",
+      "integrity": "sha512-4K3bqJpXpqfg2XKGK9bpDTc6xO/xoUP/RBWS7AtRMug6zZFaRekiLzjVtAoZMquxoAbzBvy5nxQ7veS5eYzf8A==",
       "dev": true,
       "license": "MIT",
       "dependencies": {
-        "undici-types": "~7.16.0"
+        "undici-types": "~7.18.0"
       }
     },
     "node_modules/@types/normalize-package-data": {
@@ -3848,9 +3848,9 @@
       }
     },
     "node_modules/undici-types": {
-      "version": "7.16.0",
-      "resolved": "https://registry.npmjs.org/undici-types/-/undici-types-7.16.0.tgz",
-      "integrity": "sha512-Zz+aZWSj8LE6zoxD+xrjh4VfkIG8Ya6LvYkZqtUQGJPZjYl53ypCaUwWqo7eI0x66KBGeRo+mlBEkMSeSZ38Nw==",
+      "version": "7.18.2",
+      "resolved": "https://registry.npmjs.org/undici-types/-/undici-types-7.18.2.tgz",
+      "integrity": "sha512-AsuCzffGHJybSaRrmr5eHr81mwJU3kjw6M+uprWvCXiNeN9SOGwQ3Jn8jb8m3Z6izVgknn1R0FTCEAP2QrLY/w==",
       "dev": true,
       "license": "MIT"
     },
diff --git a/package.json b/package.json
index 2cd129c..9bac675 100644
--- a/package.json
+++ b/package.json
@@ -33,7 +33,7 @@
     "@eslint/js": "^9.39.2",
     "@playwright/test": "^1.58.2",
     "@types/eslint": "^9.6.1",
-    "@types/node": "^25.2.3",

     "eslint": "^9.39.2",

stdout.text: üìù AI Log: AI Fill: username field = standard_user
üìù AI Log: AI Fill: password field = secret_sauce
üìù AI Log: AI Click: login button
üìù AI Log: Logged in as standard_user and navigated to products page
üìù AI Log: AI Click: first add to cart button
üìù AI Log: Selector not found, trying fallback strategies
üìù AI Log: Clicked add to cart for first product
üìù AI Log: AI Click: shopping cart icon
üìù AI Log: Selector not found, trying fallback strategies
üìù AI Log: Verified product appears in cart

steps.title: Given I am logged in as "standard_user"
When I click on "Add to cart" button for the first product
Then I should see the cart counter increase
And the product should appear in the cart
